SmartFieldSpec.Name: Not tested Earliest Sponsorship Date Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Not tested Earliest child sponsorship date of all financial sponsorships or gifted sponsorships for a constituent. Includes former sponsorships as well.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Earliest Child Sponsorship or Correspondent Date
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_EARLIESTCHILDFINANCIALORGIFTEDSPONSORSHIPDATEFORCONSTITUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date
begin ; with financialSponsors as ( select distinct c.ID, min(s.STARTDATE) as EARLIESTSTARTDATE from dbo.CONSTITUENT c join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
group by c.ID ), sponsors as ( select distinct c.ID, min(s.STARTDATE) as EARLIESTSTARTDATE from dbo.CONSTITUENT c join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
group by c.ID )
select coalesce (fs.ID, s.ID) as ID, case when fs.EARLIESTSTARTDATE is null then s.EARLIESTSTARTDATE when s.EARLIESTSTARTDATE is null then fs.EARLIESTSTARTDATE when fs.EARLIESTSTARTDATE < s.EARLIESTSTARTDATE then fs.EARLIESTSTARTDATE else s.EARLIESTSTARTDATE end as EARLIESTSTARTDATE from financialSponsors fs full outer join sponsors s on fs.ID = s.ID end
